CORS Proxy Setup

To use this application with APIs that have CORS restrictions, we need to request temporary access to the CORS Anywhere proxy.

1. Click the button below to open the CORS Anywhere demo page:

2. On the page that opens, click the "Request temporary access to the demo server" button

3. After receiving the "You currently have temporary access to the demo server" message, you can close that tab

4. Return to this tab and click the button below to go back to the application:
